name: Symmetry-partition-sort
tagline: This is the fastest sorting known so far
body:
AdpSymmetryPSort.cpp by Jingchao Chen is a C++ source code for Symmetry Partition Sort, 
which is the fastest practical sorting known so far. 
See paper http://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1002/spe.851/abstract                                 

For the other version of this library such as AdoSymmetryPSort.cpp, see http://www.gtoal.com/languages/bcpl/BCPL/bcplprogs/sort/
or
https://docs.google.com/file/d/0BxAfEASHYgsIUFE0amdRWTFFbXM/edit?pli=1
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
